amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that a company would not be required to have an advisory vote on executive compensation if they, instead, require a majority vote of those voting, to seat a director on the board of directors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph providing for a majority-elected board exemption.
